meanings.definition: A type of extinct flying reptile with a long wingspan and a toothed beak.
meanings.sent1: The pterodactyl soared gracefully through the prehistoric skies.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of the pterodactyl to learn more about ancient creatures.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they imagined a pterodactyl wearing sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: Her kite danced in the wind like a playful pterodactyl in flight.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit brought the pterodactyl to life with its realistic model.

meanings.definition: A pterosaur of the genus Pterodactylus.
meanings.sent1: The Pterodactylus was a fascinating creature that lived millions of years ago.
meanings.sent2: Researchers discovered a new species of pterodactyl in the fossil record.
meanings.sent3: The tiny toy pterodactylus sat perched on the shelf, guarding the room.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination took flight like a majestic Pterodactylus soaring above the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The ancient drawings depicted the Pterodactylus in all its glory.
